message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $115. It's a great deal for you, and I'm confident you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I was hoping to keep my spending within a $100 limit. Would it be possible for us to negotiate the price down to $100?

Bob, I understand your budget constraint. While I'm willing to negotiate, $100 simply wouldn't cover my costs. Would you be willing to go up to $110? This would still be a great deal for you, and I believe you'll find the product well worth it.
